text:
From: Office <office@tibiel.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, August 27, 2024 8:56 AM
To: Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>
Subject: Fwd: Reminder of your outstanding invoices and request for payment of the amount due - Ref.: 1-566-148392-13336911

 

Аничко, добро утро.

Препращам писмо от колекторска фирма CSOB Factoring в Полша, във връзка ненаправени плащания към HEXONIC-CZ-s.r.o.

Пишат, че юни са изпращали фактура-няма такава. Не намирам и договор с Hexonic, които са доставчик на топлообменници.

Дали знаеш нещо?

 

 

Tibiel Team

________________________________

From: info@csobfactoring.cz <mailto:info@csobfactoring.cz>  <info@csobfactoring.cz <mailto:info@csobfactoring.cz> >
Sent: Monday, August 26, 2024 9:09:11 PM
To: Office <office@tibiel.com <mailto:office@tibiel.com> >
Subject: Reminder of your outstanding invoices and request for payment of the amount due - Ref.: 1-566-148392-13336911 

 

Dear Customer,

Your supplier, company HEXONIC CZ s.r.o., has assigned to us, on the basis of a factoring contract, receivables arising from the supply of goods or services to your company. We have thus become your new creditor and payments of these receivables must be made to our bank account.

The invoices listed in the attached file remain unpaid to date. 

We ask you to compare our records with your records and pay the amount due to our bank account indicated in the attachment.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

Processed by: Ludmila Drábková

E-mail: drabkova@csobfactoring.cz <mailto:drabkova@csobfactoring.cz> 

Phone: +420 607 028 003

	

 

ČSOB Factoring, a.s.

Výmolova 353/3

150 26 Praha 5-Radlice

www.csobfactoring.cz <https://www.csobfactoring.cz> 

	
	
	
Please include our Reference in your reply, see below.

Reference: 1-566-148392-13336911
